title: Market Factors Explorer
description: Interactive tool to visualize factor exposures and performance across time with simple backtests.

title: Stock Sentiment Analysis
description: Using Vertex AI api to facilitate sentiment analysis of equities over social media like reddit.

title: Options Volatility Surfaces
description: Uses y-finance options price data as input to the black scholes data to derive volatility. X: Moneyness (strike / spot), Y: Days to expiration, Z: IV
